Print Settings Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System (Linux)

Select File»Page Setup and click the Printer Setup button to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to send a print job to the printer.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Paper size—Sets the paper size for the print job.
  • Orientation—Sets landscape or portrait page orientation.
  • Print script—Indicates the tool on the system that takes the print job.
